pr_title: New authorization in other Perun modules

replies.bodyText: Yes, it is. TOPGROUPCREATOR should be able only to create top-level groups and be able to call methods to list Vos and Groups (which can get back empty lists).
replies.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.message:
New authorization in other Perun modules

- Authorization was replaced in CabinetManagerImpl,
  PerunNotifNotificationManagerImpl, ConsolidatorManagerImpl,
  MailManagerImpl, RegistrarManagerImpl.

New authorization in other Perun modules

- Authorization was replaced in CabinetManagerImpl,
  PerunNotifNotificationManagerImpl, ConsolidatorManagerImpl,
  MailManagerImpl, RegistrarManagerImpl.
